_comment: Edit the 'hostedBase' URL for each model to point to your own CDN or server.
_comment2: ACC Worker will check hostedBase FIRST, then fall back to HuggingFace if null.
_comment3: Expected directory layout on your server: <hostedBase>/manifest.json, config.json, tokenizer.json, shards/shard_00.bin ...
_comment4: Set 'hostedBase' to null to always download from HuggingFace and convert on-device.

_hosting_guide.step1: Convert your model using the ACC Converter page to get manifest.json, config.json, tokenizer.json, and shards/ folder
_hosting_guide.step2: Upload the entire .acc folder to your CDN/server
_hosting_guide.step3: Set the hostedBase URL above to your CDN path (no trailing slash)
_hosting_guide.step4: Users will now download your pre-converted .acc shards directly â€” no HuggingFace, no on-device conversion
_hosting_guide.step5: This is 3-5x faster first load since .acc shards are already quantized
